name: Deep Space Diggers
description:
The dwarves of Dorfic Kingdom are greatly enhanced with cybernetics and robotics and they love to dig. As long as they can eat, sleep and have a pint, of course. They dig, they build required stuff, dig deeper, build more, deeper, deeper and deeper.

It’s been a bumpy road and we had to cut a lot of features but we found a version with a taste of our grand vision.

Gameplay is simple: You give a command to dwarves and one of them will pick up and take care of it. As you need energy and get more dwarves, you always need to keep digging deeper and deeper.

Make sure to build one of each building early on to ensure your dwarves have a place to eat and sleep and have fun… and convert ore into energy.

We hope you enjoy the game!

 Source Code https://github.com/themaelstorm/LD2021
